title: Draft season trade bait
itunes:title: Draft season trade bait
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including Dean Blandino resigning his post as the NFL’s senior vice president of officiating, and defensive tackle Kawann Short singing an $80.5 million deal with the Panthers. Then the heroes discuss which players are possible trade bait this draft season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
